info.name: Hide lock for HTTPS, autohide i icon (FX 52+)
info.description:
• Hides lock icons for secure (HTTPS) pages
  • Autohides info "i" icons for all pages except those that use permissions
  • EV SSL site name and "Firefox" text is still displayed
Please use this extension to get broken padlocks for all HTTP sites and therefore easily differ between insecure and secure connections. If you can, also vote for this config preference!
info.additionalInfo: This is more lightweight and future-proof version of my last style. Works well on Firefox 57+ using userChrome.css ;) Changelog: 17.09.17: Puzzle icons removed on extension pages 03.09.17: Description adjustments 20.08.17: "Advanced settings" removed, every line has comments for easier manual manipulation
